LLM BaÄŸlantÄ±sÄ± â€‹

Projenizde LLM baÄŸlantÄ±sÄ± merkezi bir core/llm.py dosyasÄ±nda yÃ¶netilir. Bu sayede tÃ¼m ajanlar aynÄ± model konfigÃ¼rasyonunu kullanÄ±r.

Temel YapÄ± â€‹

python
# core/llm.py
from langchain_ollama import ChatOllama

# Ana model (Qwen3 8B)
llm = ChatOllama(
    model="qwen3:8b",
    base_url="http://localhost:11434",
    temperature=0.7,
)

# Alternatif model (daha kÃ¼Ã§Ã¼k/hÄ±zlÄ±)
llm_qwen1 = ChatOllama(
    model="qwen2.5:1.5b",
    base_url="http://localhost:11434",
    temperature=0.3,
)

Desteklenen Model SaÄŸlayÄ±cÄ±larÄ± â€‹

LLM Parametreleri â€‹

ParametreAÃ§Ä±klamaÃ–nerilen DeÄŸer
temperatureYaratÄ±cÄ±lÄ±k (0=deterministik, 1=Ã§ok yaratÄ±cÄ±)0.3-0.7

LLM Ã‡aÄŸÄ±rma YÃ¶ntemleri â€‹

.invoke() â€” Senkron â€‹

python
from langchain_core.messages import HumanMessage, SystemMessage

response = llm.invoke([
    SystemMessage(content="Sen bir matematik uzmanÄ±sÄ±n."),
    HumanMessage(content="Pi sayÄ±sÄ±nÄ±n deÄŸeri nedir?")
])

print(response.content)

.stream() â€” Streaming â€‹

python
for chunk in llm.stream([HumanMessage(content="Python nedir?")]):
    print(chunk.content, end="", flush=True)

Prompt Template ile Zincir â€‹

python
from langchain_core.prompts import ChatPromptTemplate
from langchain_core.output_parsers import StrOutputParser

prompt = ChatPromptTemplate.from_messages([
    ("system", "Sen bir {alan} uzmanÄ±sÄ±n. TÃ¼rkÃ§e yanÄ±t ver."),
    ("human", "{soru}")
])

chain = prompt | llm | StrOutputParser()

result = chain.invoke({
    "alan": "hukuk",
    "soru": "Kira sÃ¶zleÅŸmesi nedir?"
})

Projenizde Ä°ki Model KullanÄ±mÄ± â€‹

Projeniz hem llm hem llm_qwen1 import ediyor. Bu mimariyle:
